name: nse-papertrade
description: Do papertrade with out losing your capital. Inspired by Sensibull and Tradingview paper trades.
postinstall: (cd server && npm install); (cd client && npm install)

scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix ./client & npm run dev --prefix ./server
scripts.echo: echo "use `npm run dev` from both client and server folder " && exit 1

author: Anand.AV
